document.full_text: john lennon's handwritten lyrics for the song "lucy in the sky with diamonds" are up for auction, in the latest episode for a storied beatles classic.
document.title: lennon's "lucy in the sky" lyrics up for auction
lines_and_colors: john lennon's handwritten lyrics for the song "lucy in the sky with diamonds" are up for auction, in the latest episode for a storied beatles classic.
